General.Name: Rockchain
General.Description: Rockchain is privacy-focused decentralized network for data processing. The blockchain is used for the transaction process, while a file distributed system network was created to safely store the sensitive data. Rockchain's platform is powered by an Ethereum-based token named ROK which can be used to purchase data within Rockchain's network.

ICO.Description:
Rockchain is privacy-focused decentralized network for data processing. The blockchain is used for the transaction process, while a file distributed system network was created to safely store the sensitive data. Rockchain's platform is powered by an Ethereum-based token named ROK which can be used to compute data within Rockchain's network.

Team:

  • Sebastien Jehan: CEO & Rockchain Inventor. 
  • Aayush Anand: Technical coordinator & cloud architect. 
  • Yosra Helal: Blockchain developer. ​
  • Melanie Hadj Hamou: Community Manager assistant. 
  • Regis Gourdel: GO and crypto developer. 
  • Oscar Luis Blanco Brito: GO developer. 
  • Karim Mabrouk: Go developer. 
  • Cyrine Baccar: BI & Python developer. 
  • Miguel Angel: Go developer. 

Rockchain will be holding its ICO on November 1st, 2017. The ICO token supply represents 80% of the total token supply, so there will be a total of 80,000,000 tokens available at the offering. The ICO funding target is 18,000 ETH, the funding cap is 100,000 ETH and is expected to end on December 1st, 2017 or when the funding cap is reached.

Token Reserve Split (20%):

  • 19% Team and Early Invstors;
  • 1% Bounty campaign.

Rockchain's ICO campaign will feature Bonuses, Bounties and Escrow service, and the token will not be mineable.

Bonus Structure:

  • 10% First 5 days;
  • 5% The next 5 days.
